name: Touhous in Norse mythology world
description:
Oh no! Reimu has been isekaid into Norse mythology world, a world where the Touhous claim to be a part of Norse mythology but otherwise it's not all that different. There's only one way for Reimu to get out of this mess. By beating everyone up. Luckily, she's very good at that.

Controls-

Arrow keys- Move

Z- Attack with hammer

X- Shoot a bullet

C- Dodge

Shift- Run

Esc- Pause

Created for Touhou game jam 5.
